That was all he needed to hear.  They were enemy forces.  Being who he was,=
 Tucson needed to test the waters before he could make a reasonable deducti=
on, and now the determination of his situation was confirmed.  But he knew =
he couldn't just attack them.  Perhaps if he went with them he might just s=
tumble upon the others.

" Hmmm, in that case I suppose I better follow you=
.  Fine, I will go with you."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.=
 

On Sep 12, 2011, at 12:44 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> w=
rote:

> > <OLD
> >
> > Tucson whips his tail on the ground and then lifts =
his head out of the
> > brush.
> >
> > " If you think I'm going to harm you=
, don't worry, I won't. Whoever you
> > are, my name is Tucson Prime, Maxim=
al Commander. Perhaps you may be able to
> > assist me. Several of my comra=
des have gone missing, and if you're willing
> > to help, I will see to it =
that you're rewarded for your assistance."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> As TUSCON reveal=
ed himself so did the other figures. The most
> prominant was the one to th=
e front of TUSCON, he looked like he turned
> into a creature similar to SL=
AG's beastmode that of an organic
> triceratops dinosaur. However he was co=
nstructed differently and he
> was was a mustard yellow in color.
> 
> Howe=
ver he was in robot mode now, and although he resembled slag, he
> was not =
as massive as he, standing a little shorter than TUSCON
> himself, but he a=
lso looked far more intelligent.
> 
> To either side there were two other f=
igures, one was purple and red
> and looked like he turned into some sort o=
f avian creature similar to
> TERRORSAUR and the other was a marine green w=
ith purple chestplating.
> He looked like he might turn into something simi=
lar to DINOBOT, but it
> was difficult to tell. Both of them were a little =
smaller than the
> figure that stood in front of TUSCON
> 
> The first figu=
re standing before TUSCON spoke, obviously the one in
> charge as held his =
weapon on TUSCON and shook his head. "No." he said.
> "You will come with u=
s now. The only choice you have is how it will be
> done. You can either be=
 our prisoner or as a burnt out chassis!"
> 
> The two on the sides of TUSC=
ON just chuckled evilly as they held their
> weapons on him.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
=
> Preston

aters before he could make a reasonable deduction, and now the determinatio=

> Tucson whips his ta=
il on the ground and then lifts his head out of the<br>
> brush.<br>
&gt=
;<br>
> " If you think I'm going to harm you, don't worry, I won't.  Who=
ever you<br>
> are, my name is Tucson Prime, Maximal Commander.  Perhaps=
 you may be able to<br>
> assist me.  Several of my comrades have gone m=
issing, and if you're willing<br>
> to help, I will see to it that you'r=
e rewarded for your assistance."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
As TUSCON re=
vealed himself so did the other figures. The most<br>
prominant was the one=
 to the front of TUSCON, he looked like he turned<br>
into a creature simil=
ar to SLAG's beastmode that of an organic<br>
triceratops dinosaur. However=
 he was constructed differently and he<br>
was was a mustard yellow in colo=
r.<br>
<br>
However he was in robot mode now, and although he resembled sla=
g, he<br>
was not as massive as he, standing a little shorter than TUSCON<b=
r>
himself, but he also looked far more intelligent.<br>
<br>
To either sid=
e there were two other figures, one was purple and red<br>
and looked like =
he turned into some sort of avian creature similar to<br>
TERRORSAUR and th=
e other was a marine green with purple chestplating.<br>
He looked like he =
might turn into something similar to DINOBOT, but it<br>
was difficult to t=
ell. Both of them were a little smaller than the<br>
figure that stood in f=
ront of TUSCON<br>
<br>
The first figure standing before TUSCON spoke, obvi=
ously the one in<br>
charge as held his weapon on TUSCON and shook his head=
. "No." he said.<br>
"You will come with us now. The only choice you have i=
s how it will be<br>
done. You can either be our prisoner or as a burnt out=
 chassis!"<br>
<br>
The two on the sides of TUSCON just chuckled evilly as =
they held their<br>
weapons on him.<br>
